page.pageName: [ZT PMM] New plans page-Zero trust services

metaTags.metaDescription: Explore our Zero Trust offerings and find the plan that's right for your business to secure users, devices, and networks.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Security, Performance, and Reliability - all in one package

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Simplify and secure internal access, stop phishing threats, protect data, enforce AI usage controls, and more.

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: Uptime
features.description:
Dependable service level agreements (SLA) for paid plans with 100% uptime and reliable service you can trust.

[Learn more >](https://www.cloudflare.com/enterprise-support-sla/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: Support and services
features.description: [Support](https://www.support.cloudflare.com/s/?language=en_US) options vary by plan type. Various professional advisory and hands-on implementation [services](https://www.cloudflare.com/professional-services/) available as add-on to Contract plans.

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

planValues.textValue: Phone, chat, and ticket support; professional services available (add-on)

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: Standard log retention
features.description:
Zero Trust logs are stored for a varying period of time based on the plan type and service used. Contract users can export logs via Logpush.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/insights/logs/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

planValues.textValue: Up to 6 months; Logpush to SIEM/cloud storage

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: Application connector software
features.description:
Securely connects resources to Cloudflare without a publicly routable IP address. Does not require VM infrastructure and has no throughput limitations.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/connections/connect-networks/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

features.name: Device client (agent) software
features.description:
Securely and privately sends traffic from end user devices to Cloudflare's global network. Enables capabilities like building device posture rules or enforcing filtering policies anywhere. Self-enroll or deploy via MDM.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/connections/connect-devices/warp/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

features.name: Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
features.description:
ZTNA provides granular identity- and context-based access to all your internal self-hosted, SaaS, and non-web (e.g., SSH) resources.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/policies/access/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

features.name: Secure Web Gateway (SWG)
features.description:
SWG protects against ransomware, phishing, and other threats using L4-7 network, DNS, and HTTP filtering policies for faster, safer Internet browsing.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/policies/gateway/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

features.name: Digital Experience Monitoring (DEX)
features.description:
Provides user-centric visibility into device, network, and application performance across your Zero Trust organization.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/insights/dex/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: Network flow monitoring
features.description:
Provides network traffic visibility and real-time alerts for unified insights into network activity. Available for free to everyone.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/magic-network-monitoring/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB)
features.description:
CASB continuously monitors SaaS apps at rest to detect potential data exposure due to misconfigurations or weak posture findings.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/applications/scan-apps/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: Data Loss Prevention (DLP)
features.description:
DLP detects sensitive data in transit and at rest across web, SaaS and private apps with controls or remediation guides to stop leakage or exposure.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/policies/data-loss-prevention/)

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go

plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: Log Explorer
features.description:
Free and pay-as-you-go plan: Free for the first 10 GB, $1 per GB per month after

Enterprise: Custom pricing

plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: Remote Browser Isolation (RBI)
features.description:
RBI layers additional threat defense and data protection controls across browsing activities by running all browser code on Cloudflare's global network.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/policies/browser-isolation/)

features.description: Deploy to your entire device fleet via MDM tools. Or, users can download the device client themselves to self-enroll.

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SASE or workspace security deployment.

features.name: App connector (tunnels)
features.description: Connect resources to Cloudflare without a publicly routable IP address. Deploy via UI, API, or CLI.

relatedBlades.title: Looking for Cloudflare One plans?
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare One is our single-vendor SASE platform that converges the workspace security services above with network services — including Magic WAN and Firewall — described on the next pricing tab.

Contact us to learn more about SASE packaging options.
